Text: Follow them! Don't let 'em get away!
We're not getting anywhere like this!
But if we just wait until they get tiredâ€”

That big one doesn't look tired at all! We're gonna
tire out first!
We gotta do whatever it takes to get outta here!
I can't!
Why?

I at least want to take that tablet with us!
It probably holds Templar secrets!

Just seeing it was good enough! It's enough to know
that they're a part of the Church!
Don't just chase after them! Set up a perimeter!
Oh no!

Looks like we were a little too slow to decide...
We're way outnumbered, but we've got to fight!
Beta, you know best how to fight the Templar!
...We have to eradicate them, all at once.
All at once? How?!
By using "Ebony Swirl!"

The technique that Lady Alpha taught us! But with so
many Templars, they'll easily block such a wide-range
attack.

It's not a slime sword that you unleash! It's a
precision attack capable of laying waste to its
surroundings!
Beta, are...
...are you for real?!
Aren't you afraid you'll miss?
I ALSO never miss!
I gotcha! I'll leave the timing to you!
...Attack!
One arrow to pierce through a swarm of enemies!

An attack with unmatched precision, where the arrow
itself is shot with the force of a tempest!
Here we go! Ebony Swirl! Helix!
Un...believable...!

Have they just...broken though all of our magical
defenses...?!
I feel...dizzy...!
Epsilon! Let's finish this together!
Sure! No biggie!
W-We did it!
Oh?!
What! Don't tell me there's more!

We should have killed the monster quickly and just
ran off with the tablet from the start!

I guess I'm just as stupid as you are for not
realizing that...!
Hey, what's with the shaking?

Don't tell me that the ruins are about to collapse
due to all those slime blades flying all over the
place...?

About to...? It's happening right now! You really
over did it this time!
How could you say that! I had to improvise, too!

The tablet! We've got to at least leave with the
stone tablet!
Hey! C'mon! I'm not leaving here alone!
The Jugang Ruins... They're collapsing!
Looks like Beta and Epsilon made quite the splash.

However, since they've gone this far, they should
return to the Garden with solid results.
Heh... They make a perfect combo, those two!

So I went on a trip with someone I don't really get
along with, and a bunch of stuff happened.
Hmm...
(It's silly to try and hide it, Epsilon...)
(You went on vacation to the city-states with Beta.)

(So that person you said you don't get along with
could only be her.)

(But why don't you get along? She doesn't seem like a
bad person to me.)

So I spent some time thinking about what Master
Shadow would have done!

(She's so anxious. I'm sure there's more to talk
about than just slime.)

(There is almost no way for me to know what is true
and what is a fabrication.)

(It's probably better if I don't probe too deep.
Let me try and use the magic words...)
Well, you seem to be on good enough terms to fight.
Huh...?
Heh...
Master...

(I'm glad I said what I did, but I wish I had thought
more about what to say next.)

(Some generic phrase will work, but don't be too
confident.)
Cid! I know you're in there!
*gasp*
C-Claire?

I didn't go through the trouble of making the trip
home just for you to hole up in your room!

Hurry up and get out here and say "hi" to your
sister!
Oh! S-Sorry! I'll be right there! Please wait for me!

I don't have a choice, do I? I'll give you 10 seconds
to get out here. Ten! Nine! Eight! Seven! Six! Fiâ€”
Huff...huff...

Now I get it... After seeing the relationship between
you two, I now understand "to be on good enough terms
to fight."

...You don't think that Beta and I have the same
sort of relationship, do you?!
No way! Beta and I aren't...!

She's an airhead who needs a smack upside the head
every now and then, yet she's still like familyâ€”

Ahh! Master Shadow! This to too confusing for me
right now!
